title: Which PC is the best option for me
body:
My current PC right now is on it's last leg after 5 years so now I got to look at new comps.  The most demanding PC games I play at the moment the Rise of the Tomb Raider/Fallout 4/Skyrim, but I spend a good time on League so if I can run the graphic intensive games on at least med settings I am good.
